scripts.postinstall: npm run install:presets && npm run link:packages
scripts.link:packages: rm -rf node_modules && mkdir -p node_modules && npm run link:presets:packages && npm run link:skypager:packages
scripts.link:skypager:packages: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && ln -sf ../packages/skypager-* . && cd ..
scripts.link:presets:packages: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && ln -sf ../packages/skypager-presets/node_modules/* . && cd ..
